description: This source file contains utility functions for configuration management and safe JSON parsing in a frontend project, specifically for obtaining API base URL from environment variables and parsing JSON values with fallback.

methods.name: export function getApiBaseUrl(): string { getApiBaseUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the Notes backend base URL from Vite environment variables and ensures proper formatting.

methods.name: export function safeJson<T>(value: unknown, fallback: T): T { safeJson
methods.description: Parses a value into JSON safely, returning a fallback value if parsing fails.

ctags.name: safeJson
ctags.pattern: /^export function safeJson<T>(value: unknown, fallback: T): T {$/

ctags.name: url
ctags.pattern: /^  const url = import.meta.env.VITE_NOTES_API_BASE_URL as string | undefined;$/
